exprs.expr: cast('2008-2-23' as date) + cast('P1Y' as intervalyear)
cast('2008-2-23' as date) + cast('P1D' as intervalday)
cast('12:20:30' as time) + cast('PT1H0M3S' as intervalday)
cast('2008-2-23 12:00:00' as timestamp) + cast('P1D' as intervalday)
cast('2008-2-23 12:00:00' as timestamp) + cast('P1Y2M' as intervalyear)
cast('2008-2-23 12:00:00 America/Los_Angeles' as timestamptz) + cast('P1D' as intervalday)
cast('2008-2-23 12:00:00 America/Los_Angeles' as timestamptz) + cast('P1Y2M' as intervalyear)
cast('P1Y' as intervalyear) + cast('2008-2-23' as date)
cast('P1D' as intervalday) + cast('2008-2-23' as date)
cast('PT1H0M3S' as intervalday) + cast('12:20:30' as time)
cast('P1D' as intervalday) + cast('2008-2-23 12:00:00' as timestamp)
cast('P1Y2M' as intervalyear) + cast('2008-2-23 12:00:00' as timestamp)
cast('P1D' as intervalday) + cast('2008-2-23 12:00:00 America/Los_Angeles' as timestamptz)
cast('P1Y2M' as intervalyear) + cast('2008-2-23 12:00:00 America/Los_Angeles' as timestamptz)
